content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: loom
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 10}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 40}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 21, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a loom, I need to craft spruce planks and string. I have string in my inventory, so I will start by crafting the spruce planks. I have one stripped dark oak wood in my inventory, which I can use to craft the spruce planks. Therefore, I will move the stripped dark oak wood from slot 36 into the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: loom
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 10}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 40}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 21, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the spruce planks, I can move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: loom
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 40}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 21, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a loom, I need to place two string items vertically in the crafting grid. I will move one of the strings from slot 44 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: loom
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 40}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 21, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have placed one string in the crafting grid, I need to place the second string below it. I will move the second string from slot 44 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: loom
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 40}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 21, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have placed the two string items in the crafting grid, I need to place a wood plank adjacent to them. I will move one of the dark_oak_planks from slot 11 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: loom
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 40}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 21, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have placed the first wood plank adjacent to the strings, I need to place the second wood plank adjacent to it. I will move another dark_oak_plank from slot 11 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: loom
inventory=[{"type": "loom", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 40}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 21, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have placed the two wood planks adjacent to the strings, I can craft the loom. I will move the crafted loom from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
